summary: don't understand how some people still stan axel "i try to show my love to the community" auriant harder than other people who...
question: don't understand how some people still stan axel "i try to show my love to the community" auriant harder than other people who blatantly bully their fans for their sexual orientation as though we were back in the 30s?? in this economy??
answer:
Ikr. And why does it matter he is straight? He says fuck homophobes and panphobes and I’m here for it. Should I support other cast and especially one person just because she is bisexual? Yeah right, who cares if she’s mocking other people’s sexuality. I just can’t understand how can you be a part of LGBT and still invalidate other sexual orientation. Fuck, you know how hard it is to admit to yourself, to come out and be proud of yourself. She has the audacity to say ‘nah sorry bro your sexuality doesn’t exists’.

We can see Axel cares and defends fans. And she’s not. I don’t care about her opinion but she knows a part of her fandom is pansexual and she’s still laughing and talking about it in the interviews.

I know i love and stan the right cast.

blog.name: flying-elliska
blog.title: Flying Elliska
blog.description: Ellie. 27. salty marshmallow 💖💜💙 bi as hell. FR/NL. skam france blog with a side of nl. eliott demaury owns my soul tbh

title: Acting Highlights - Assa
body:
Favorite acting moments from the mains for  @renewskamfrance ‘s Appreciation Week - Assa edition. In chronological order : 

1. Her little smile in the mirror to herself in Saturday 12:32 “Badass” - I said this already but I was like wow at that one because it’s such a testimony to her resilience, that she’s able to smile after getting those kind of comments online, the hint of defiance of it too after she puts on more lipstick after having her make-up criticized. And the humor it shows, the vivid inner life, those little touches made Imane into such an interesting character. (and tbh the reason i watched all the season even if I was so disappointed in some of the writing choices, bc Imane had all my heart right from the start.) 

2. The door talk in Friday 9:18 pm “Juste toi et moi” I still love this scene so much and because we don’t see Sofiane all the emotional weight lies on Assa as she makes Imane shift gradually from humiliation and anger and sadness, to empathy for Sofiane as she pictures his story, and then her soft smiles and hopefulness. We can see how she struggles with herself throughout, that she’s afraid of letting him get closer but really wants to at the same time. It’s so soft. 

3. The funfair date as a whole - again, happy soft playful Imane is my favorite. I love how this is really the first time we get to see a whole new side of her - she’s playful, a little competitive, a little flirty in an innocent way. She eats cookies and throws balls at stacks of tin cans and lets herself picture their future children and we can see that she’s just letting herself live the dream at that moment. They’re just floating in their own little bubble for a short while. 

4. Imane’s dance in Mercredi 4:53 “Arrête de parler” on Sanctify by Years & Years. All of Imane dancing moments are my favorite but this one in particular - she looks so graceful and fluid and joyful as she dances, it’s like for one brief moment all the weight on her shoulders has been lifted, she’s been given a space to express herself freely and she needs it so badly and it’s so beautiful. I live for happy Imane and I wish we’d seen her more. 

5. Imane’s speech in Friday 15h21 “C’est pas mort”. I am not a huge fan of how they resolved this conflict but the part where Imane says that she’s always been made to believe she was the problem, but she’s coming to realize she wasn’t, is just so heartbreaking and beautiful. She’s standing up for herself and opening her heart and talking about her deepest wounds and fears all at once, and the way Assa’s voice breaks is just so…ugh darling.

summary: Hahaha It’s funny! Your favorite straight gay hate lesbians
question: Hahaha It’s funny! Your favorite straight gay hate lesbians
answer:
Hahahahaha I know hilarious! I fell of my chair. Oh wait a second. He didn’t include my sexuality too. Axel why do you hate me? Imma quickly change my profile pic.

“straight gay” so straight or gay? What is the truth? I’m sorry for supporting straights and not panphobes.


Twitter allows only 4 pictures. Can you use your brain cells or your head is just a decoration? It’s a pride month. Can we stop looking for hate and drama everywhere?

blog.name: altereliott
blog.title: minuto per minuto.
blog.description: annie | 20 | crushing hard on maxence danet fauvel | skam, skamit & skamfr | martino rametta, eliott demaury & lucas lallemant need protection | @altereliott on AO3

summary: Annie, what are Lucas and Eliott doing for pride? 💖
question: Annie, what are Lucas and Eliott doing for pride? 💖
answer:
Lucas and Eliott will celebrate the fuck out of it. Especially Lucas. Mika is teasing him the whole time because of the talk they had and how Lucas would NEVER EVER celebrate pride. And well, now he‘s standing in the living room, literally covered in different pride flags, ready to punch every homophobe he sees and Eliott just stands there, his little pan-flag pin on his jacket, smiling at his beautiful and stupid idiot boyfriend while he‘s falling in love with him all over again. They‘re walking hand in hand in a pride parade, celebrating their love loud and clearly while Lucas just smiles brighter than the sun, introducing his mec to everyone who would like to know about Eliott and to everyone else who doesn‘t give a fuck too. When they come across some homophobes, Eliott has to hold back his little grumpy hedgehog from doing things he‘ll definitely regret later.

The whole month, Lucas and Eliott show solidarity to every kind of sexuality and every kind of gender. And Lucas tells Eliott even more often how much he loves him and how happy he is that he came into his life. Oh, and they‘re still taking it minute by minute, celebrating every second like a big event.

blog.name: flying-elliska
blog.title: Flying Elliska
blog.description: Ellie. 27. salty marshmallow 💖💜💙 bi as hell. FR/NL. skam france blog with a side of nl. eliott demaury owns my soul tbh

title: Acting highlights - Lucas
body:
Favorite acting moments from the mains for @renewskamfrance’s Appreciation Week - Axel Edition. In chronological order : 

1. The eyebrow wiggle in Vendredi 17h12 “Et moi tu me dessinerais comment.” It’s such a small thing but it made me giggle out of happiness when I first saw it. It’s such an Even thing to do, and Lucas in this clip is so bold and charming - it anchors the reciprocity and playfulness of their relationship, and this clip is the one where I started falling for their version of the story. Right there he’s like ‘okay, bring it on, do your worst’ to Eliott, it’s almost like he’s daring him, and bold Lucas is one of my favorite things ever. 

2. Lucas’s face just before the kiss in Vendredi 20h27 “Le premier.” These are quite possibly my favorite few seconds of the entire season. He’s stepped out of the dark and as he raises his hands, he’s letting Eliott know I see you, I know your story, I know who you are. And we believe, in that moment, that he is not afraid, wholeheartedly. There’s almost a hint of cockiness, in that moment, too, a hint of ‘gotcha’, he’s probably happy with himself for having figured it out too. But mostly this is the first time he’s telling Eliott you are not alone, and he feels so certain and sure about it. And he’s so effing thrilled at being part of it all. He’s making a choice, he’s stepping into his own life, his own story. He knows what’s coming and he wants it and he’s letting Eliott know !!!!!!!!!!!!!! god it’s all coming together so perfectly in that moment. 

3. Gate punching because I like to suffer I guess. Method acting, wow. But in the whole clip, there is something just so intense and overpowering about Lucas’ rage and despair. We are just so there with him, I almost remember how my hand hurt after I watched the clip. I mean I don’t think actors should have to hurt themselves to show their commitment to the role but watching the clip i can totally understand why he did it - he just seems posessed by the role in the whole thing and Lucas’ descent into anger then despair, powerlessness and numbness and so he punches that gate because he has no other way to let the emotions out. Wow. 

4. Intervention. The whole clip just…everytime I see it, I cry like a little baby. I am in awe of how Axel just went there so fully without witholding anything. The little waver in his voice as he says how the couch is his room actually, the lip wobble and ugly tears, the sheer raw despair as it all bursts out…it’s so painful and yet so cathartic as he finally lets it all out, everything that has been building up, and we live every single second with him. 

5. Lucas’s tearful smile at the end of Jeudi 17:32 “C’est pas des adieux”. That smile just says so, so much. The weight of all he’s been through, the joy of it, the relief, the pride, the exhaustion, the longing, the sheer happiness. It’s in that moment where it seems he’s realizing the journey he’s just been on and how worth it it has been. He’s finally found someone he loves and that loves him just as much, he’s come out and accepted himself, and even though there was pain and fear and he’s basically having withdrawal symptoms over Eliott leaving, he knows he will get him back. And he’s letting himself bask in those emotions, after so long repressing them. He’s crying in the street and he doesn’t give a shit. It’s so powerful. It’s basically a reward for the hell they’ve put us through all season and just wow. If only for that smile, it was worth it. 

I could go on forever, he’s incredible in basically each scene he is in but yeah, those are my personal favorites.

It’s in that moment where it seems he’s realizing the journey he’s just been on and how worth it it has been. He’s finally found someone he loves and that loves him just as much, he’s come out and accepted himself, and even though there was pain and fear and he’s basically having withdrawal symptoms over Eliott leaving, he knows he will get him back. And he’s letting himself bask in those emotions, after so long repressing them. He’s crying in the street and he doesn’t give a shit. It’s so powerful. It’s basically a reward for the hell they’ve put us through all season and just wow. If only for that smile, it was worth it. 

I could go on forever, he’s incredible in basically each scene he is in but yeah, those are my personal favorites.

trail.content_raw:
Favorite acting moments from the mains for @renewskamfrance’s Appreciation Week - Axel Edition. In chronological order : 

1. The eyebrow wiggle in Vendredi 17h12 “Et moi tu me dessinerais comment.” It’s such a small thing but it made me giggle out of happiness when I first saw it. It’s such an Even thing to do, and Lucas in this clip is so bold and charming - it anchors the reciprocity and playfulness of their relationship, and this clip is the one where I started falling for their version of the story. Right there he’s like ‘okay, bring it on, do your worst’ to Eliott, it’s almost like he’s daring him, and bold Lucas is one of my favorite things ever. 

2. Lucas’s face just before the kiss in Vendredi 20h27 “Le premier.” These are quite possibly my favorite few seconds of the entire season. He’s stepped out of the dark and as he raises his hands, he’s letting Eliott know I see you, I know your story, I know who you are. And we believe, in that moment, that he is not afraid, wholeheartedly. There’s almost a hint of cockiness, in that moment, too, a hint of ‘gotcha’, he’s probably happy with himself for having figured it out too. But mostly this is the first time he’s telling Eliott you are not alone, and he feels so certain and sure about it. And he’s so effing thrilled at being part of it all. He’s making a choice, he’s stepping into his own life, his own story. He knows what’s coming and he wants it and he’s letting Eliott know !!!!!!!!!!!!!! god it’s all coming together so perfectly in that moment. 

3. Gate punching because I like to suffer I guess. Method acting, wow. But in the whole clip, there is something just so intense and overpowering about Lucas’ rage and despair. We are just so there with him, I almost remember how my hand hurt after I watched the clip. I mean I don’t think actors should have to hurt themselves to show their commitment to the role but watching the clip i can totally understand why he did it - he just seems posessed by the role in the whole thing and Lucas’ descent into anger then despair, powerlessness and numbness and so he punches that gate because he has no other way to let the emotions out. Wow. 

4. Intervention. The whole clip just…everytime I see it, I cry like a little baby. I am in awe of how Axel just went there so fully without witholding anything. The little waver in his voice as he says how the couch is his room actually, the lip wobble and ugly tears, the sheer raw despair as it all bursts out…it’s so painful and yet so cathartic as he finally lets it all out, everything that has been building up, and we live every single second with him. 

5. Lucas’s tearful smile at the end of Jeudi 17:32 “C’est pas des adieux”. That smile just says so, so much. The weight of all he’s been through, the joy of it, the relief, the pride, the exhaustion, the longing, the sheer happiness. It’s in that moment where it seems he’s realizing the journey he’s just been on and how worth it it has been. He’s finally found someone he loves and that loves him just as much, he’s come out and accepted himself, and even though there was pain and fear and he’s basically having withdrawal symptoms over Eliott leaving, he knows he will get him back. And he’s letting himself bask in those emotions, after so long repressing them. He’s crying in the street and he doesn’t give a shit. It’s so powerful. It’s basically a reward for the hell they’ve put us through all season and just wow. If only for that smile, it was worth it. 

I could go on forever, he’s incredible in basically each scene he is in but yeah, those are my personal favorites.

And, Lucas will never have to be pas peur in the dark again.
